content: That's a great idea. I'll definitely suggest a few specific dates and times, but also leave room for Alex's input. I'll make sure to ask about their availability and if they have a specific date or time in mind. Thanks for the advice! By the way, speaking of reconnecting with old friends, I've also recently reconnected with my friend from college, Chris, on social media. We caught up on each other's lives and he's getting married this summer.
